WorkItem.ClosedComment: Apparently, a new PLK is needed for a new version of the DSL. To avoid having to create a new PLK for every release, I'm making the DSL version fixed at 1.0.0.0 but I am incrementing the MSI and assembly versions to 1.1.0.0.
WorkItem.Description:
